Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Pentecost:

Text.Language: Pa[oic I/couc Pi,~rictoc: v/eyn/ou qen tefmahc~nou] m~paroucia~: a~riounai n~a~gap/ neman: qen pekb/ma etoi n~ho].
My Lord Jesus Christ, who is coming in His second advent, grant us loving mercy, before Your fearsome judgment seat.
ياربي يسوع المسيح الآتى فى مجيئه الثانى ، إصنع معنا محبة ، فى منبرك المخوف .
Euws e~bol eujw m~moc: je ,~ouab ouoh ,~ouab ,~ouab P[oic n~nie~wn <rictoc a~nect/ ek nekrwn.
proclaiming and saying, “Holy, holy, holy, O Lord of the ages, Christ is risen from the dead.”
صارخين قائلين قدوس قدوس قدوس رب الدهور المسيح قام من الاموات.
